fields.name: HTTPConfiguration
fields.description: The parameters used to perform test evaluation over HTTP.

fields.name: IcmpConfiguration
fields.description: The parameters used to perform test evaluation over ICMP.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the connection monitor test configuration.

fields.name: PreferredIPVersion
fields.description: The preferred IP version to use in test evaluation. The connection monitor may choose to use a different version depending on other parameters.

fields.name: Protocol
fields.description: The protocol to use in test evaluation.

fields.name: SuccessThreshold
fields.description: The threshold for declaring a test successful.

fields.name: TcpConfiguration
fields.description: The parameters used to perform test evaluation over TCP.

fields.name: TestFrequencySec
fields.description: The frequency of test evaluation, in seconds.
